Ellen is comparing two rectangles.

:ibox:• Rectangle P is 5 inches long and 1 inch wide.
• Rectangle Q is 4 inches long and 2 inches wide.
Which statement correctly compares the areas and perimeters of the rectangles?

A.Choice: The rectangles have equal areas, and rectangle P has a greater perimeter.

B.Choice: The rectangles have equal areas, and rectangle Q has a greater perimeter.

C.Choice: The rectangles have equal perimeters, and rectangle P has a greater area.

D.Choice: The rectangles have equal perimeters, and rectangle Q has a greater area.

Content: Lacey has a bookcase with 6 shelves.
